2.0.1 makes Twitter sharing even better.Live GIF 2.0 comes with a bunch of improvements to make sharing your Live Photos as easy as possible. Many services don’t have full GIF support

version_description:
Version 2.0.1 makes Twitter sharing even better.

Live GIF 2.0 comes with a bunch of improvements to make sharing your Live Photos as easy as possible. Many services don’t have full GIF support, so we worked behind the scenes to make exporting super slick. Live GIF 2.0 can share to even more services, including: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, WhatsApp, and Notes.

- We optimized sharing to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, WhatsApp, and Notes with custom integrations. Take that, lack of GIF support!
- Turns out not everybody loves ads so we removed the link to Priime.
- Automatic filesize management based on service, so the highest quality possible always gets shared.
- iOS 9.1 support. This let us make the Live Photos in the grid animate.
- Lots of performance improvements.

Version 2.0.1 makes Twitter sharing even better.

Live GIF 2.0 comes with a bunch of improvements to make sharing your Live Photos as easy as possible. Many services don’t have full GIF support, so we worked behind the scenes to make exporting super slick. Live GIF 2.0 can share to even more services, including: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, WhatsApp, and Notes.

- We optimized sharing to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, WhatsApp, and Notes with custom integrations. Take that, lack of GIF support!
- Turns out not everybody loves ads so we removed the link to Priime.
- Automatic filesize management based on service, so the highest quality possible always gets shared.
- iOS 9.1 support. This let us make the Live Photos in the grid animate.
- Lots of performance improvements.
Got a shiny new iPhone SE? We’ve improved compatibility with iPhone SE!
Got a shiny new iPhone SE? We’ve improved compatibility with iPhone SE!
Got the new 9.7-inch iPad Pro? Lucky you! Live GIF is now a universal app with full iPad multitasking support.
